message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic opportunity to purchase [product name]. Given its unique value proposition, I'm initially proposing a price of $1150000. I believe this is a fair reflection of the significant benefits you'll gain.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. However, I believe a more reasonable price for the product would be $1000000. Let me know if this works for you!

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I understand your perspective, the value of this product to you is undeniable. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1100000. This revised price reflects my desire to find a mutually beneficial agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I can only commit to a maximum price of $1050000 for the product. I hope this can work for you!
